description:
The crew’s hard-fought journey to reach Terezart comes to a head. With heavy enemy presence in the area, Yamato is driven into a corner, and available options are dwindling.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Terezart Jouriku Sakusen: Teki Missile Kantai o Tatake!
The Terezart Landing Operation: Crush the Enemy Missile Fleet!
テレザート上陸作戦・敵ミサイル艦隊を叩け!
